name: FIGHT for FRIEND
description:
Story

“ PROUD ” was born with the disease *Prosopagnosia.  When she plays with other kids, she doesn't know their feelings. Sometimes she plays too hard, and the kids don't want to play with her.  So she has few friends. Her best friend is an **Introvert boy neighbor. His name is “ PHONE ”. Maybe God played a joke on her because he is the only one that she can see his face, and luckily he's happy to play with her.

*Prosopagnosia is a brain defect in remembering and processing human faces. People with the disease can see but can't recognize or classify the human face, and some can't remember their faces.

**An introvert is a group of people with a high personal world, preferring to be alone or with close friends only.

When they were in high school, PHONE became the most popular student because he was very handsome and kind. Every day there are a lot of female students coming to talk with him, so he feels very tired. He asked Proud to help! PROUD didn't quite understand because she thought his appearance was normal. But she says Yes!

Now, their school life is like a Lancer robot war game that they both like playing together in childhood!!

How to Play?!

// The scene in this game will be PROUD’s imagination. //

Mission - Destroy the enemies and obstacles until you die. //Endless Run//

Controller (Keyboard Only)

  • A  D - Moving (Left & Right)
  • Spacebar - Jump
  • Left Mouse Click - Shoot (The obstacles)
